about_the_game:
Diced Up! is a top-down bullet hell where you survive as long as you can with randomized stats and weapons. Fight enemies and bosses alone or with your friends to get to higher floors and get a high score. Upgrade your weapons between runs to become stronger.

In the demo version of Diced Up!, you may pick between 10 and 20 floors to play, after which your run will automatically end. Some features from the full game are missing, such as online multiplayer, leaderboards, weapon progression, and achievements.
